alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 25 at 9:45PM EDT until April 26 at 5:08PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Youngs Creek at Amity. .Recent rainfall of one to one and a half inches has led to lowland and minor flooding along Young Creek at Amity. Flooding is expected to continue into Tuesday. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Youngs Creek at Amity. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Youngs Creek at flood stage. Most low areas along creek are flooded. Approaches to CR 400S bridge over Youngs Creek begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM EDT Monday the stage was 7.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 PM EDT Monday was 7.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 6.3 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated by noon Tuesday.
